code: import React from'react';import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';import{faHome,faExchangeAlt,faChartLine,faUser,faBell,faSignOutAlt}from'@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons';import'./Sidebar.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Sidebar=_ref=>{let{activeMenu,setActiveMenu,notifications,handleLogout}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"sidebar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"sidebar-header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"BudgetBuddy"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"sidebar-menu",children:[[{id:'dashboard',icon:faHome,label:'Dashboard'},{id:'transactions',icon:faExchangeAlt,label:'Transactions'},{id:'overview',icon:faChartLine,label:'Overview'},{id:'profile',icon:faUser,label:'Profile'},{id:'notifications',icon:faBell,label:'Notifications'}].map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:activeMenu===item.id?'active':'',onClick:()=>setActiveMenu(item.id),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:item.icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:item.label}),item.id==='notifications'&&notifications.filter(n=>!n.is_read).length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"notification-badge",children:notifications.filter(n=>!n.is_read).length})]},item.id)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{onClick:handleLogout,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faSignOutAlt}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Logout"})]})]})]});};export default Sidebar;
